hero.title: The modern runtime for agent-native development
hero.subtitle: From workflows to real agents. VM0 makes agent building accessible through natural language, backed by agent-native infrastructure.

build.title: Build agents the human way
build.description: Today's options fall into two buckets: tools that only run containers, and workflow builders that are too rigid for real agent behavior. Developers still lack an environment built for agent-native execution. VM0 bridges this gap with an end to end agent-native runtime.
build.vm0Tagline: Build and evolve AI agents, just natural language.

cliAgents.title: Riding the LLM wave, VM0 also acts as an agent router
cliAgents.description: Use Claude Code, Codex, Gemini, and other CLI agents to build your own. VM0 fits into any agent development and provides the infrastructure you need to create your own agent or smart workflows.

marketingAgent.title: Marketing agent
marketingAgent.description: A protected space for marketing agents to run tasks and refine campaigns risk-free

productivityAgent.title: Productivity agent
productivityAgent.description: Run actions and refine routines safely, with full control and zero risk to production

researchAgent.title: Deep research agent
researchAgent.description: Gather information, analyze sources, and iterate safely in an isolated workspace

codingAgent.title: Coding management agent
codingAgent.description: Discovers trending repos and manages issues, PRs, and repo tasks

features.title: A better agent development experience, built on solid infrastructure

noWorkflows.title: No more workflows. It can be simple as just one prompt.
noWorkflows.description: No drag-and-drop needed — write a prompt or any type of configure files, connect it to VM0, and your agent's core logic is ready.

purposeBuilt.title: Purpose-built for agents, not just code
purposeBuilt.description: Traditional containers run programs. VM0 runs agents, preserving their sessions, memory, and reasoning context. It understands agents as stateful, iterative processes, not one-off scripts.

observable.title: Observable by design
observable.description: Every run is transparent. You can see logs, metrics, and tool calls in real time, no more black-box containers. Debug, replay, and monitor every step of the agent lifecycle.

reproducible.title: Reproducible and persistent
reproducible.description: Each run creates a checkpoint you can restore, fork, or optimize. Sessions and artifacts persist across runs and environments. Agents keep their memory. Developers keep control.

infrastructure.title: VM0 is AI infrastructure built for the next paradigm

versionedStorage.title: Versioned artifact storage
versionedStorage.description: Sync files instantly between your sandbox and cloud storage, prewarmed before runtime.

sessionContinuity.title: Session continuity
sessionContinuity.description: Automatically persists CLI agent sessions and memory, unaffected by container lifetimes.

structuredObservability.title: Structured observability
structuredObservability.description: Stream every log, metric, and token trace through a clean API or dashboard, no manual logging needed.

checkpoint.title: Checkpoint & replay
checkpoint.description: Each run creates a checkpoint snapshot. Reattach, replay, or tweak the prompt anytime.

cta.title: Build and evolve AI agents inside their own reality
cta.subtitle: // Express your intent. VM0 handles the rest.

footer.tagline: The modern runtime for agent-native development

hero.title: Cookbooks
hero.description: Ready-to-run agent examples to get you started quickly. Each cookbook is a complete, working example you can deploy in minutes.

cta.title: Ready to build your own agent?
cta.subtitle: // start with a cookbook, make it yours

101-intro.name: Intro Cookbook
101-intro.description: Step-by-step introduction covering essential CLI commands, agent development basics, and platform fundamentals.

102-writing-agent.name: Writing Agent
102-writing-agent.description: Multi-step writing agent that generates, reviews, and refines content with iterative improvement cycles.

103-fetch-stores.name: Fetch & Store
103-fetch-stores.description: Demonstrates fetching external data and storing results in VM0's artifact system for persistence.

104-content-farm.name: Content Farm
104-content-farm.description: Automated content generation pipeline with quality checks, SEO optimization, and multi-format output.

105-hf-trainer.name: HuggingFace Trainer
105-hf-trainer.description: Fine-tune HuggingFace models inside VM0 sandboxes with GPU support and experiment tracking.

106-tiktok-influencer.name: TikTok Influencer
106-tiktok-influencer.description: Analyze TikTok trends, generate viral content ideas, and automate posting schedules.

107-firecrawl-summary.name: Firecrawl Summary
107-firecrawl-summary.description: Crawl websites with Firecrawl and generate intelligent summaries and insights from web content.

108-competitor-research.name: Competitor Research
108-competitor-research.description: Automated competitive intelligence gathering with market analysis and trend detection.

109-github-agent.name: GitHub Agent
109-github-agent.description: Autonomous GitHub workflow agent for code reviews, issue triage, and PR management.

110-startup-portrait.name: Startup Portrait
110-startup-portrait.description: Generate comprehensive startup analysis reports with market sizing and competitive positioning.
